name: Monster Mansion (itch)
description:
You play as a ghost who spends his afterlife in a mansion and you don't wanna go to heaven or hell or anywhere else.

Press Z to fire goo at your attackers

Collect skulls for power-ups

The green bars in the top left corner represent your energy (ammo) and your health

Created by:

Lindsey O'Brien

Kelsey Blizzard

Lauren Niedelman
